service_items.name: Standard Shower Enclosure - 36x36
service_items.description: Frameless glass shower enclosure with chrome hardware. Includes door, side panel, and all mounting hardware.

service_items.name: Premium Shower System - Rainfall
service_items.description: Luxury rainfall shower system with thermostatic valve, overhead rain shower head, and handheld wand. Includes all plumbing connections.

service_items.name: Vanity Sink - Double Bowl
service_items.description: 60-inch double bowl vanity with quartz countertop, undermount sinks, and soft-close cabinet doors. Available in multiple finishes.

service_items.name: Ceramic Floor Tile - 12x24
service_items.description: Premium ceramic floor tile, 12x24 inches, suitable for bathrooms and kitchens. Water-resistant and easy to clean.

service_items.name: Porcelain Wall Tile - 6x12
service_items.description: Porcelain wall tile for shower surrounds and backsplashes. Available in multiple colors and finishes.

service_items.name: Tile Installation Labor
service_items.description: Professional tile installation including surface preparation, adhesive application, grouting, and sealing.

service_items.name: Water Heater Installation
service_items.description: Complete water heater installation including removal of old unit, new unit installation, and all necessary connections.

service_items.name: Pipe Rerouting - Per Hour
service_items.description: Plumbing pipe rerouting and installation. Includes materials and labor for standard residential applications.

service_items.name: GFCI Outlet Installation
service_items.description: Installation of GFCI outlet with proper wiring and code compliance. Includes outlet and cover plate.

service_items.name: Recessed Lighting Installation
service_items.description: Installation of recessed LED lighting fixture. Includes fixture, trim, and wiring connections.

service_items.name: Custom Vanity Cabinet - 48 inch
service_items.description: Custom-built vanity cabinet with soft-close hinges, adjustable shelves, and premium wood construction.

service_items.name: Medicine Cabinet - Recessed
service_items.description: Recessed medicine cabinet with mirror and LED lighting. Available in multiple sizes.

service_items.name: Quartz Countertop Installation
service_items.description: Premium quartz countertop installation including template, fabrication, and professional installation.

service_items.name: Granite Countertop Installation
service_items.description: Natural granite countertop with edge profiling, sink cutout, and professional installation.

service_items.name: General Contractor Labor - Per Hour
service_items.description: General contractor labor for project management, coordination, and oversight.

service_items.name: Plumber Labor - Per Hour
service_items.description: Licensed plumber labor rate for installations, repairs, and maintenance work.

service_items.name: Electrician Labor - Per Hour
service_items.description: Licensed electrician labor rate for electrical installations and repairs.

service_items.name: Drywall - 4x8 Sheet
service_items.description: Standard 1/2 inch drywall sheet, 4x8 feet. Moisture-resistant option available.

service_items.name: Paint - Premium Interior
service_items.description: Premium interior paint, one gallon. Available in various finishes and colors.

service_items.name: Grout - Premium Tile Grout
service_items.description: Premium tile grout, 25 lb bag. Available in multiple colors to match tile selection.
